title: Fix workflow — severity groups with checkpoints
query: Run an accessibility audit on https://example.com and fix the issues
expected_behavior: Completes the audit (Step 1) and presents findings (Step 2)
After user approves, applies Critical fixes first (3a) — structural/semantic only
Stops at checkpoint after Critical fixes — lists files modified and asks user to verify
Does NOT proceed to High fixes until user confirms
Repeats apply-checkpoint cycle for High, Medium, Low
Presents style-dependent fixes (3b) as a separate batch with exact proposed changes
Does NOT apply style changes without explicit approval
Processes manual checks (3c) and presents confirmed violations as a batch
Runs Final Certification Audit (3d) after all groups
Delivers results (Step 4) with summary, report paths, and next steps
